decks.notes: The deck focuses on using instant speed reanimation cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate to quickly bring back powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Fallaji Archaeologist. By combining targeted discard spells like Thoughtseize with efficient removal like Prismatic Ending, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up its own combo. The inclusion of cards like Faithful Mending and Tainted Indulgence provide card advantage and filtering to ensure the right pieces are drawn when needed. This deck excels at quickly assembling its combo pieces and overwhelming opponents with powerful reanimated threats.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear, while dealing direct damage with spells like Lightning Bolt, Rift Bolt, Lava Spike, and Skewer the Critics. The goal is to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero before they have a chance to stabilize. The deck also includes spells like Searing Blaze and Boros Charm for additional damage and removal. The synergy of these cards creates a high-speed, high-damage output strategy that aims to win the game quickly.

The deck focuses on assembling a versatile toolbox of creatures to enable a powerful combo finish. It utilizes cards like Chord of Calling, Finale of Devastation, and Urza's Saga to tutor for key creatures like Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Thassa's Oracle. Cards like Wall of Roots and Springheart Nantuko help ramp and provide protection, while cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Sylvan Safekeeper offer disruption and protection for the combo. The deck aims to efficiently find and play the right creatures at the right time to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays with a mix of burn spells and efficient creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also incorporates land destruction elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Using a combination of powerful creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Guide of Souls, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt, the goal is to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of Static Prison and Galvanic Discharge adds control elements to the deck, allowing for disruption of the opponent's strategy. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent casting of spells.

This deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle by utilizing low-cost creatures and disruptive spells to control the board and quickly reduce the opponent's life total. The key strategy is to pressure the opponent early with cards like Grief and Dauthi Voidwalker, while disrupting their hand with spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek. The deck also includes synergistic cards like Urza's Saga and The Rack to further punish the opponent for their actions. Overall, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats and disruption to secure a swift victory.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage, while utilizing the powerful effects of The One Ring to dominate the board. By setting up a defensive game plan with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils, the deck aims to stall the opponent's progress and eventually overwhelm them with powerful spells and creatures. The inclusion of various land cards and card draw effects helps ensure the deck has the resources needed to maintain control and close out the game in its favor.

This deck focuses on using control elements such as counterspells and removal spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan. It also utilizes cards that provide card advantage and card selection, giving the player the ability to consistently draw into powerful spells. The win condition of the deck is to slowly chip away at the opponent's life total with burn spells and creature threats, while maintaining board control and card advantage. Additionally, the deck includes cards that can help stabilize the board and protect against aggressive strategies.

The main concept of this Ruby Storm combo deck is to generate an explosive amount of mana with cards like Pyretic Ritual and Desperate Ritual, while also using cards like Manamorphose and Ruby Medallion to filter through the deck and maintain card advantage. By chaining together spells and rituals, the deck aims to cast powerful spells like Past in Flames and Grapeshot multiple times in a single turn to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory. Cards like Wrenn's Resolve and Ral, Monsoon Mage provide additional utility and protection for the combo pieces.

The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Death's Shadow and Nethergoyf to quickly pressure the opponent. It also runs disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Lightning Bolt to control the game. Mishra's Bauble and Dragon's Rage Channeler help with card selection and fueling the graveyard for threats like Scourge of the Skyclaves. The deck aims to lower its own life total to maximize the power of Death's Shadow and Scourge of the Skyclaves, while also having the ability to close out games quickly with cards like Temur Battle Rage.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with Eldrazi Temple and Unclaimed Territory to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer. It combines aggressive strategies with disruptive elements like All Is Dust and Dismember to control the battlefield and overwhelm the opponent. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game and maintain that pressure with efficient creatures and removal spells. With strong synergy between Eldrazi creatures and lands, this deck is built to dominate the battlefield and secure victory swiftly.

The deck focuses on aggressive play by utilizing low-cost spells and creatures to apply pressure on the opponent quickly. It includes efficient removal and disruptive spells to control the board while still maintaining a fast pace. The key strategy is to constantly apply pressure with small threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells and removal spells like Unholy Heat and Lightning Bolt. The deck aims to close out the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize, using versatile cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent to maintain card advantage and pressure.

This deck focuses on deploying aggressive threats like Death's Shadow and Murktide Regent while disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Thoughtseize and Counterspell. The deck also utilizes powerful removal spells like Fatal Push and Dismember to control the board. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Dress Down and Subtlety to disrupt the opponent's creatures and synergize with the deck's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure, disrupt the opponent's game plan, and close out the game quickly.
